name: Doors Open
details: Doors open for ticket sales. Play-as-you-go electronic games available: $1 per machine, 3 for $2, 5 for $3.

name: Daytime Sessions
details: Bingo session begins. Standard session pricing: $11 per machine, 2 machines for $22 (includes all 6-packs and double actions). Paper cards: 1 card $1, 6 cards for $5.

name: Afternoon Play
pricing: From $1 / machine · 4 for $3 · Paper games $1/card or 6 for $5
details: Pricing continues at $1 per machine or 4 machines for $3. Special games like Letter X, Lucky Seven, and Treasure Hunt available ($1 per card or 6 for $5).

name: Evening Session
details: Session sales begin. Evening session at 7:30 PM: $11 per machine or 2 for $22. Daub tickets with progressive jackpot play during second half of session. Pull tabs (horse races) available all day.

name: Late Night Program
details: Pay-as-you-go games: $1 per machine, 3 for $2, 5 for $3. Fast-paced and shorter-format games. Session may continue until 10-11 PM.
